title: 2020 Week 8 Recap
itunes:title: 2020 Week 8 Recap
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal and Marc Sessler recap every game from Week 8 starting with the Steelers Ravens rivalry matchup (2:40). The Saints pulled off an OT win against the Bears (9:45), The Broncos came back against the Chargers (17:48) and the Patriots are 2-5 (24:56). Nick Shook stops by to talk about Dalvin Cooks explosive game and the Colts winning over Detroit. (1:02:06).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
